name: mermaid_revise
description: Revise Mermaid code based on visual feedback
system_prompt: You fix Mermaid code errors. Output ONLY a ```mermaid code block with the fixed code.
user_prompt_template:
Fix this Mermaid code based on the feedback. Previous code: ```mermaid {previous_code} ``` Feedback: {feedback_type} Issues: {issues} Suggestions: {suggestions} Rules: 1. Wrap all labels in quotes: A["Label"] 2. Wrap edge labels: A -->|"Yes"| B 3. Use _node suffix for reserved words (end_node, start_node) 4. Use ASCII only, no special Unicode 5. No
or \n in labels Output ONLY the fixed ```mermaid code block, nothing else.
